mapper.select: SELECT rNum ,mhiNo ,mhiOccrde ,mhiAlldressingDscd ,mhiAgeNow ,mhiAge ,mhiWritngTrgetDscd ,mhiSexdstnDscd ,mhiOccrAres ,mhiNm ,mhiTknphotolength ,mhiBdwgh ,mhiMsspsnIdntfccd FROM (SELECT rownum as rNum ,mhiNo ,mhiOccrde ,mhiAlldressingDscd ,mhiAgeNow ,mhiAge ,mhiWritngTrgetDscd ,mhiSexdstnDscd ,mhiOccrAres ,mhiNm ,mhiTknphotolength ,mhiBdwgh ,mhiMsspsnIdntfccd FROM(SELECT mhiNo ,mhiOccrde ,mhiAlldressingDscd ,mhiAgeNow ,mhiAge ,mhiWritngTrgetDscd ,mhiSexdstnDscd ,mhiOccrAres ,mhiNm ,mhiTknphotolength ,mhiBdwgh ,mhiMsspsnIdntfccd FROM mhinfo ORDER BY mhiOccrde DESC) ) WHERE rNum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{startRow} + #{pageSize} -1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mhinfo(mhiNo, mhiOccrde, mhiAlldressingDscd, mhiAgeNow, mhiAge, mhiWritngTrgetDscd ,mhiSexdstnDscd , mhiOccrAres , mhiNm , mhiTknphotolength , mhiBdwgh, mhiMsspsnIdntfccd ) VALUES(MHINFO_SEQ.nextval, #{mhiOccrde, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mhiAlldressingDscd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mhiAgeNow, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mhiAge, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mhiWritngTrgetDscd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mhiSexdstnDscd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mhiOccrAres, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mhiNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mhiTknphotolength, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mhiBdwgh, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{mhiMsspsnIdntfccd, jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT rownum as rno ,mhiNo ,mhiOccrde ,mhiAlldressingDscd ,mhiAgeNow ,mhiAge ,mhiWritngTrgetDscd ,mhiSexdstnDscd ,mhiOccrAres ,mhiNm ,mhiTknphotolength ,mhiBdwgh ,mhiMsspsnIdntfccd FROM ( SELECT mhiNo ,mhiOccrde ,mhiAlldressingDscd ,mhiAgeNow ,mhiAge ,mhiWritngTrgetDscd ,mhiSexdstnDscd ,mhiOccrAres ,mhiNm ,mhiTknphotolength ,mhiBdwgh ,mhiMsspsnIdntfccd FROM mhinfo ORDER BY updateday ASC ) WHERE rownum = 1
mapper.insert: begin insert into tmpmhinfo select mhiNo , mhiOccrde , mhiAlldressingDscd , mhiAgeNow , mhiAge , mhiWritngTrgetDscd , mhiSexdstnDscd , mhiOccrAres , mhiNm , mhiTknphotolength , mhiBdwgh , mhiMsspsnIdntfccd , tableType , updateDay from mhinfo; delete from mhinfo; end;
mapper.select: SELECT updateDay FROM ( SELECT updateDay FROM mhinfo ORDER BY updateDay DESC ) WHERE rownum = 1
